product_name: Moving Comfort Foxie Half-Zip Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for running in chilly weather, the women's Moving Comfort Foxie Half-Zip Jacket offers reflective back details and UPF 50+ sun protection. Warm, texture-rich polyester jacquard fabric with spandex for stretch. Half-zip with high neck and zipper garage. Radial sleeves allow full range of motion. Thumbholes in cuffs. Zip pocket at back right side. Moving Comfort Foxie Half-Zip Jacket has a 26-in. length. Closeout.
short_description: Great for running in chilly weather, the women's Moving Comfort Foxie Half-Zip Jacket offers reflective back details and UPF 50+ sun protection.
